sentence.Network_en: An interpreter should enbrace good work ethics and a loftiness of patriotism.
sentence.Network_cn: 口译议员必须具有良好的职业道德和爱国主义的情操.

sentence.Network_en: Meili Snow Mountain is world - known for its loftiness, magnificence and mysteriousness.
sentence.Network_cn: 梅里雪山以其巍峨壮丽、神秘莫测闻名于世.

sentence.Network_en: We were all greatly moved by his loftiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们都被他那种所深深打动.
